summary: A mod replacing the JaySus loading screens.
descriptionHtml:
I use a mod called Uncle Sheo\'s Really Helpful Hints and Tips (here\'s the link: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12234). It is one of my favorite mods and it (in my opinion) never gets old. I got the Jaysus weapons mod, and I was very happy with the new weapons... But not with the loading screens. They had a lot of grammatical errors, and were just boring over all. This mod aims to improve those loading screens, by making them crazy and random, just like Uncle Sheo\'s. Enjoy! (And go easy on me, it\'s my first mod)

Like this mod? Have climates of Tamriel? Then you may also like this mod by me: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24865

Do you want the Phenderix Loading Screens spiced up? You\'ve come to the right guy. http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24884

Dawnguard loading screens
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31766

**NEW** Hearthfire loading screens **NEW**
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31820

**NEW** Frostfall Loading Screens **NEW**
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/33738
author: Nonmeatbag

files.name: Uncle Sheo Does JaySuS- No titles on screen
